description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Are you hardcore enough? Climb your way as high as you can in this platforming shooter complete with an insane collection of guns and explosives. Lots of Guns will have you fighting zombies under an evil moon, out of control robots in a factory, medieval knights, and monster slime creatures on your journey. Voxel styled pixel art gives this game a distinct but retro feel.
